title: New: Noble Oak – The Mydriatic Sea
body:
Having [‘tipped’](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/13124-sound-of-2012-part-3-josh/) **Noble Oak** as an act to keep on your radar in 2012, it’s brilliant to hear new material from the Vancouver musician despite being only two days into the new year. _The Mydriatic Sea_ finds **Noble Oak** experimenting with vocal sections, morphing them beyond recognition whilst keeping them intriguing. Where his highly recommended debut EP _**No Bloke**_ took a more straightforward glo-wave direction, this new cut appears to be trialing new sounds and methods, to sumptuous effect. With more new material on the way, and a debut physical release just around the corner, I’m eagerly anticipating watching **Noble Oak** spread his branches.

 [The Mydriatic Sea](http://soundcloud.com/nobleoak/the-mydriatic-sea) by [Noble Oak](http://soundcloud.com/nobleoak)
